text:
Today i'm going to tell you about the
single most important thing

on the internet this is something that
you should be actively chasing as it's

the only thing that i know of that can
bring you more fortune

more freedom and more fulfillment all at
the same time

now back in the day when i was working
in the world of sales

one of the greatest lessons that i
learned was that the relationships that

you build with people
is what ends up bringing you the most

success
see i would often go around

neighborhoods talking to random people
about their internet that was my job

to sell tv and internet packages and
most people would automatically turn me

down from the get-go
most people would tell me they weren't

interested and shoot me away
but i was almost always assigned to a

specific area for like three to four
days which meant that you would always

find me walking up and down the blocks
in that specific neighborhood and what

naturally happened was that i would see
certain people again

and again as they went about their day
and often times when i bumped into the

same people again
i would try to hang out with them for a

bit i would sit down on their porch
or on their steps and start talking to

them about random things
and i did this because i genuinely

wanted
to take a break from doing my rounds it

was a great way to pass some time
and also to rest my legs i would talk to

these people about all sorts of things
what life is like for them

what they currently do how they feel
about the neighborhood

what passions they have we would often
trade stories

have a good laugh and then i would go
back to work

and what i found is that those that i
nurtured a relationship with

would often become my customers later
down the line

see after bumping into me two or three
times many of them

would actually invite me into their
homes to take a look

at their internet to see if i could get
them a better deal

and if i couldn't get them a better deal
due to their circumstances they would

often take my business card and refer
people over sometimes even months down

the line
after seeing this happen over and over

again i started to realize that one of
the most important skills that you can

learn
in the real world is this ability to

build
relationships with others the reason

these people suddenly wanted to do
business with me after initially

rejecting me
was because i wasn't just a stranger to

them anymore
i was sort of like a friend and people

naturally want to help their friends out
which is why if you can do this if you

can build strong relationships with
people wherever you go

then you will naturally become their
most trusted

go-to guy for a specific problem which
means

more business and more success for you
down the line

now what does this have to do with the
internet well when i first started

creating content online i quickly
noticed a similarity between the

relationship
that i was able to build with some of my

viewers online
and the relationship that i was able to

build with people in real life
it's super interesting because even

though i can't see you physically
and even though you're just listening to

a recording of me speak
a relationship is still being built

you're learning more about me you're
learning about the way i think

you are forming an opinion about who i
am and the more of my content that you

watch assuming that you like it
the more i become your go-to guy for a

specific
problem whether it be breaking bad

habits or making money online
or even social skills the stronger our

relationship is
the more you will want to listen to what

i have to say
about these subjects and this online

relationship or what's often referred to
as

one's personal brand is in my opinion
the single most important thing on the

internet
and that's because it allows you to do

something that isn't
possible in real life it allows you to

build a lifetime worth of relationships
in the matter of months it's almost as

if you're able to clone yourself
a thousand times over and then send your

clones around the world to all sorts of
neighborhoods

to interact with people and build
relationships wherever they go

and personal branding is the only asset
that i know of

that can bring you fortune freedom and
fulfillment

all at the same time let me explain how
building relationships with millions of

people around the world
grants you fortune because of the

crowdfunding effect basically you're
able to tap into the power of the masses

for example let's say i fall on tough
times and i suddenly need funding

to help keep this business afloat if i
were to ask all of my subscribers for

help
for just a one dollar donation to help

support the channel
and if only just one percent of you were

able to help me out i would still be
able to raise around

twenty thousand dollars online
influencers and people who have

successfully built up their personal
brand

have this ability to tap into the power
of the masses

they're able to raise large amounts of
money without having to ask for much

from any single person and that's how it
brings you

fortune now building up a personal brand
online

also grants you freedom because the
internet allows your brand to work for

you even when
you don't feel like working the content

you've written or recorded is still
online and will continue to gain views

every day building relationships with
people around the world

effortlessly for years to come it's as
if you have an army of clones that never

stop
working that never get tired and to top

that off
that work for free and this gives you

the freedom to enjoy life
as you will no longer be forced to show

up to work at a certain time
at a certain place forced to listen to a

certain superior
because you are your own boss you have

an army of clones
that you command and finally building up

a personal brand can give you
fulfillment because it allows you to

help people
on an extremely large scale if you were

to go around helping people one-on-one
you could only help out so many people

in a day but by building relationships
with people online

you gain the ability to help out
hundreds of thousands of people

around the world with the click of a
button

you can give value away for free in the
form of your content

you can teach people how to fish you can
better their lives and get a lifetime's

worth of
work done in a single afternoon my

prediction is that all of these benefits
of

building up a personal brand will only
increase in the future as

more and more of the world moves online
which is why it's now more important

than ever
to start working on this and the great

thing is you can build up your personal
brand in many different ways you can

create content in the form of videos
like me

or you can write on medium you can take
pictures on instagram

share your thoughts on twitter and even
film short little clips on tick tock

it doesn't really matter because as long
as you are creating content

and people are viewing your content you
are still building relationships with

other people
you are still nurturing the greatest

asset on the
internet which is one's personal brand

this episode was sponsored by hover
anyone who has a successful personal

brand
has an online presence of some sort to

project that brand
onto the world and in turn monetize it

having a domain name is the first step
to doing this and hover is a great place

to get one their checkout process is
super quick and easy

it has a clean user interface with no
upsells

they allow you to connect your domain
name to many website builders

and if you run into any problems along
the way they have an amazing customer

support team that can help you out
on top of all that they are offering

free whois privacy and a special
10 discount off of your first purchase

all you got to do
is click on the link in the description

box below to get your domain which again
is the first step to building your

personal brand online
i personally regret not buying the

domain habitbuilder.com
for one of my programs early on because

true story
i actually had to spend thousands of

dollars to buy that name off of someone
else

so if you're interested in eventually
building up a personal brand

head on over to hover and grab your
domain name before someone else takes it

besides that guys stay tuned
you
